usefulItems: baking paper, cake tin (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm), oven
title: Salted caramel slice

ingredients.content: 120 g unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
150 g dark chocolate, broken into pieces (3-4 cm)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a cake tin (30 x 20 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Place butter into mixing bowl and melt <b>2 min/50°C/speed 1<b>, or until butter has melted.

Add flour, sugar and coconut and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then repeat mixing <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into prepared tin and press down to form a base.
Bake for 10 minutes (180°C). Set base aside to cool in tin (approx. 1 hour).
Place condensed milk, butter and golden syrup into mixing bowl and cook <b>20 min/100°C/speed 3<b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.
Pour caramel filling mixture over cooled base in tin, then bake for a further 10 minutes (180°C) then set aside.
Place chocolate into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter and melt <b>2 min 30 sec/50°C/speed 2<b>, or until butter has melted.
Pour chocolate mixture over caramel filling, then sprinkle with salt and set aside until chocolate sets (approx. 30 minutes). Once chocolate has set, cut into slices and serve.

hintsAndTricks: If you are making this for children, omit the coarse salt at the end.
